name: Baltic Amber Glass Candle
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:Vanilla Orchid, Amber Resin, Sandalwood.Fragrance Description:This candle will help you experience golden hour at every hour with a sensual soiree of honeyed amber resin, rich sandalwood, and the velvety incense of smoldering vanilla orchid. This luxurious scented candle will radiate lasting warmth throughout your home..About the Candle:Voluspau2019s clean-burning coconut wax blend is hand-poured into an embossed glass jar and topped with a lid that keeps the candle dust-free when not in use. The candle lasts for up to 140 hours of burn time. Voluspa candles are also designed and hand-poured in the USA and feature 100 percent natural wicks.
ingredients: Proprietary Coconut Wax Blend, Fragrance, 100% Natural Wick
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Trim wicks to one-quarter inch with each burn. .-Place candle on candle's lid, which doubles as a candle holder.-Allow wax to melt to the candleu2019s edge with each burn to prevent tunnelling..-Stop burning your candle when less than one-quarter inch of wax remains..-Upcycle your empty vessel to create a keepsake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wish i could leave zero stars. This smells so good when you open the lid but it has zero throw!! I lit it in my living room then bedroom and even bathroom. I could not smell it at all! Disappointed  especially after spending $30 for a candle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this candle the scent lasts for so long the scent is very nice

reviews.review_title: The best.  Smells incredible.  Burns beautifully.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this candle.  Hard for them to keep in stock!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite candle scent. It feels cozy, warm, and inviting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed in this candle. Iu2019ve bought Voluspa candles before and loved them. This one smelled so pretty when I first opened it, but Iu2019ve been burning it for an hour right beside me and canu2019t even smell it, much less fill the room.

This candle is perfect for sweater weather! The fragrance combines notes of amber, vanilla, and exotic spices, creating an alluring and mysterious aroma. It's a sensory journey that immediately transports me to an enchanting, far-off place.
Voluspa candles are the best and Baltic Amber is one of my favorites! This size is great too and lasts a while!
The best gift to get your coworkers or in-laws for the holidays! The scent is perfect and the glassware and design make it the ideal home gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i think baltic amber is a the perfect candle to welcome guests! it has a pleasant, woody scent and the size of the jar makes it last awhile. also, it's just so pretty! i love the design of the jar and glass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so warm and sultry. It is perfect for any space, but I currently have this one burning in my bedroom. It smells so pretty and expensive.
The warm spice the Baltic Amber candle emits creates such a cozy and welcoming environment in our home. We burn the large jar often and it has lasted quite a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: With its rich and soothing scent, it creates an ambiance that is both grounding and comforting, making it a perfect choice for relaxation and creating a cozy atmosphere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Baltic Amber candle is a true gem. Its rich and warm fragrance fills the air with a sense of grounding and tranquility. The candle's amber-colored glass container adds a touch of elegance to any space. It's a must-have for those who appreciate the unique and captivating scent of amber.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: I started with the small jar and I liked it so much that I decided to upgrade to the larger jar. It still boasts that same delightful sweet and powdery scent with a touch of spice that I adore. The best part is that it now lasts even longer. The only drawback to the larger jar is the absence of a matching glass lid, which would have added that extra touch of elegance. Still a great cozy scent, nice for fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the product for the past couple of weeks, I am very impressed with the quality of the product. The glass is really strong, and the overall feel of the candle feels very luxurious and premium.   I am surprised how strong the aroma is, as you can smell it around your home. Definitely a product worth your money as the jar is huge and really stunning to look at.

This candle has a very warm, earthy and subtly mysterious scent. It's not your typical vanilla, and there's a slightly musky undertone, which really makes it a fall scent. The glass jar is also very pretty when lit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This candle is so stunning the glass jar is so detailed I love it. The scent is also amazing the vanilla and resin combination is perfect yet with a hint of a woodsy aroma is perfection. If youu2019re looking for a warm cozy sweet scent this is it especially during the holidays. By far one of my favorites.
The Baltic Amber Glass Candle is a statement piece. Its luxurious fragrance and long burn time make it a must-have for those who appreciate the finer things in life.
Baltic Amber scent is a must have! This scent is warm and cozy, with just the right amount of sweetness. The jar color matches the scent so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite Voluspa scents. It is a deep, warm, and musky amber/sandalwood smell with a velvety vanilla hint. IT. IS. SO. GOOD!! The warm orange is stunning when lit or not lit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent and packaging are perfect for the cold weather! i love burning this at night when iu2019m getting ready to wind down from the day.
Baltic Amber is one of my favorite scents. Not only is the scent amazing, the glass design is chic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Top 3 candles of all time! on a scale from 1-10 I give it an 11. Warm and perfect for fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Baltic Amber is an for sure five-star candle. Its warm, woody scent takes over the whole room, creating a cozy, earthy ambiance. It's a must-have for those who appreciate a sophisticated and inviting fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the amber and vanilla notes! One of my favorites to burn!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This candle makes any room cozy and feel like Fall. The beautiful brown color of the glass makes it even better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Everything about this candle, from the design of the jar to the scent, screams autumn and warmth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent for the season. Beautiful warm and earthy aroma. Jar design is beautiful and gives off the perfect Fall vibes when lit. You need this in your home for the season!
This is a great candle that will keep you going for a long time. An amazing scent that is a staple around the home. Highly recommend this for your own home or for a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A Top Five for me.  The design, the colors and the look of the jar match the Baltic Amber scent perfectly.  I prefer the tin lids to the glass lids for fit.  The scent really warms up a room.
The Baltic Amber Large Jar candle is a showstopper. The size allows for hours of heavenly fragrance, and the amber scent is just divine. Worth every penny!

reviews.review_title: Not worth the price, lost smell halfway
reviews.review_text: I am definitely less impressed with this candle as I burned it. I donu2019t know if mine was defective, but it literally lost most of its smell about halfway through the wax. It has lasted almost two weeks, but the smell has almost went away. Definitely not worth their asking price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I first had the small jar of Baltic Amber and have moved on to the larger jar!  I love this warm and relaxing fragrance.  The jar and lid are so beautifully designed a great addition to any Fall decor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is our scent All of Fall, up until the holidays. We initially received this scent as a gift from a friend and has been in our lives for quite some time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful candle for a Fall tablescape. The scent of the candle is also very comforting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect addition to my fall decor. The scent and the jar both warm up my living room so nicely.
I absolutely adore this candle. It's the perfect fall candle with the warm jar, neutral toned lid, and cozy scent.

This candle has subtle wood tones that pair so well with the pumpkin spiced latte candle! I think the packaging and detail work in the lid of the jar is absolutely stunning. Love that the lid has a texture to it rather than just being a design thatu2019s printed on. Makes it feel so much fancier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Voluspa's Baltic Amber Glass Candle is a luxurious olfactory experience. The warm and exotic aroma of Baltic amber fills your space with a sense of opulence and comfort. Housed in an elegant glass container, it becomes a stylish addition to any decor. With a generous burn time, it provides hours of relaxation and ambiance. Whether you're unwinding after a long day or setting a cozy atmosphere, this candle is a perfect choice. Voluspa's Baltic Amber Glass Candle is a top pick for those who savor unique, comforting scents and desire an exquisite touch in their surroundings. It's the ideal addition to create a warm and inviting atmosphere.
I love how all these candles are coconut wax and cotton wicks!! I feel so much safer having them in the air and for my pets to be around! They burn evenly and smell amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favorite vanilla based candle because the combination of vanilla with amber makes for a more elevated scent that is sultry yet sweet. The sandalwood helps balance the smell so that the vanilla is not so overwhelming but is still warm. This scent is perfect for Fall time because of how cozy and warm the scents are.
Iu2019m obsessed with this scent and love the jar for Halloween! The jar is a beautiful orange and the lid has gold accents! I canu2019t wait to light this in my living room!

reviews.review_title: Create Your Own Beachfront Bath Experience
reviews.review_text: The sandalwood gives this candle a feeling of sun bleached driftwood on a pristine beach, with a slight hint of vanilla injecting some sweetness. An unexpectedly complex mixing of scents that results in an endlessly pleasing aroma. Highly recommend for giving a relaxing bath a beachy vibe. I prefer the aesthetics of the larger candles so bumping up a star for the visual bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, let me tell ya- this candle is AMAZING. I have it burning all day and I can't get enough of it. Candles sometimes give me a headache due to the intensity of the smell, and this one is just perfect. It really does make you feel like you walked into a high end hotel lobby, it radiates a soft vanilla and has a clean scent that will leave you refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Getting a candle of this size and quality is a must when it smells this good. I just love how this scent feels very warm and luxurious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes
reviews.review_text: This is such a yummy and luxe scent! This gives me a hotel lobby smell perfect for any living room and for decoration, since the glass is so beautiful. I am constantly burning this candle and I've barely made a dent. So worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am over the moon that this candle comes in a large jar size.  The scent the candle creates makes any room feel warm and cozy.  When this candle is lit I just want to curl up with my favorite book under a blanket.

reviews.review_title: This one is going to go fast!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have lit this candle 3 times today - it is the best! I have the mini as well, but the big one really gives off a sweet smell and lights up the room. I can't imagine it will last long with how often I am using it already!
Love this candle.  Need a lotion that smells like this.  Love the vanilla smell.  Warm and inviting.
This is always burning in my home. Itu2019s such a warm scent and great to have during winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A wonderful earthy scented candle, very fresh with a touch of sweetness. This is my new go to candle that I lit right after I cleaned my room it elevates the vibes in the room.
Even though this is my favorite scent and color I can never say enough good thingsu2026. Scent is amazing and goes thru the house without over powering. I buy this particular jar time and time again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh. I canu2019t get over these jars. The glass and design is just so beautiful. I love the scent too personally, because I like those woody scent vibes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The jar on this candle is everything. It reminds me of a walk through autumn leaves, woodsy by warm. Itu2019s charming.
Didnu2019t love the smell at first but after I burned it the smell is actually a lot sweeter and enjoyable than I thought. It lingers and is long lasting. Love!

reviews.review_title: Fills my living room with yumminess
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love!! Smells soooo good! It smells stronger when burned and better. Wasnu2019t sure about it when I smelled it out of the box but after burning itu2019s in my top favorite candles!

reviews.review_title: highly recommend if you like warm scents
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have multiple voluspa candles and love most scents - this one is no exception. It smells like warm vanilla. reminds me of Southern hospitality. really really nice. Of course the jar is beautiful. I love using the jars for other things like cotton balls, quips, or sometimes I put tea lights in them - so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To be honest I was quite surprised to see that people find that the candle is weak, I find it really effective. Essentially the smell starts to spread the moment you light it. It is a very warm and comforting scent. It is the perfect autumnal or winter candle in my opinion. The vanilla is not a sickly sweet vanilla but a really warm and mature vanilla, the star of the show is the sandalwood. Sandalwood has a reputation for being a rather masculine note but in this candle it really becomes soft and perfect as a home scent. Also the vessel for the candle is so gorgeous honestly such a beautiful piece of decor, lit or not. Yes it is pricey and I'm not sure anything can justify charging 45$ for a candle but if you are buying this as a gift or as a special treat then yes it is worth it.

reviews.review_title: If you like warm scented candles..BUY IT NOW
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this candle. It isn't the strongest fragrance, but it's a beautifully created warm scent, with some vanilla and sandalwood spreading through my home and making it feel so warm. I have been using this candle for years, and I switch between this one and Forbidden Fig. Every now and then, I also use the Tahitian Coconut, but it doesn't compare to the Baltic Amber. Just something about this fragrance that makes me keep buying these expensive candles (I always buy some during the sales since they are staples) and I enjoy every second of the scent!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful package but the scent is extremely weak. Iu2019ve tried it multiple times but no success

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect warm vanilla scent with spicy undertones been using it for 10 years

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Scent is beautiful but itu2019s very light and doesnu2019t last. Wonu2019t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Burns fast with a very light scent disappointed for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a bit disappointed with this candle. Itu2019s a beautiful light scent but the candle does not have a good throw. I will continue to use it but will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this candle. The smell is phenomenal and it throws a scent well. I am unsure about the 100 hours of burn time but it is definitely very slow burning. I also have the forbidden fig and goji orange candles and this one is still my favourite. It's not a sweet smell, but a warm one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was so excited to get these and so disappointed in them! The jars are beautiful and the scent before lighting is wonderful. But there is absolutely no throw whatsoever.  This happened with another Voluspa candle and I thought it was just that scent but maybe this is how all of them.  They are expensive so I expect some scent when lit?  Will not repurchase from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Baltic Amber is the perfect candle, it's my new go-to for gift giving. All friends and family that have come over and smelt this candle enjoy it!

Was drawn to this candle because of the gorgeous amber glass and I love the fragrance as well. It packs a strong punch of scent to the room, and itu2019s great in my living room. I have received many compliments on this candle

This sent is fast becoming my new favorite! It's like a candle version of a warm hug, and both my husband and I love to have it lit. You can definitely smell it through the whole front of the house when I have it burning in the living room, but not overpowering at all. It really is just a lovely fall-ish sent without being overtly fall. It makes me want to light the fire and put on a sweater.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This one is my favorite! I was afraid it would smell too sweet when I burned it, but itu2019s perfect!!! I light it every day in my living and it makes my home smell as if I have something delicious in the oven.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite bath time candle. It smells so good and makes me relax instantly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favorite candles! The color of the jar is so beautiful and the scent is classic. It smells so warm and inviting, without being over powering. Love this candle!
This jar is so beautiful once itu2019s lit, and smells so warm and perfect for fall. Itu2019s a natural smell that everyone always loves and compliments, and itu2019ll always be a go to for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful glass jar and lid. If you love vanilla, youu2019ll love this candle!

reviews.review_title: Fall in love with this candle ;)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Baltic Amber has warm, comforting notes, like a hug in a candle. Scent throws even without being lit. Like a pile of leaves or fire pit, it's perfect for Fall!

A rich, warm scent that works great for a living room space. Love the mixture of amber and vanilla notes, blends perfectly together and will fill the room for hours. Another great scent and decorate piece for Fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another beautiful fall scent from Voluspa! This makes my home smell amazing! The scent is sophisticated, drawing a warmth that is perfect for autumn, although I think it may be a favorite year-round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Baltic Amber is such a classic people pleasing scent. It is warm and cozy and appropriate for any time. I light this one when I have guests over and everyone always compliments it!

reviews.review_title: Elevate your home with this candle
reviews.review_text: Incredible statement piece. I have this big, beautiful candle sitting on my entry table and the smell just elevates our home. When friends walk in they always ask what scent and comment on the intricacy of the lid, which I lean on the votive to showcase the design. Will be buying again!
Refreshing scent, fills the room - a new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for an everyday all season candle my fav!!!! Not too sweet and not too heavy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This candle should be everyones new signature home scent. I get compliments from women and men on this scent every time I host a party!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gorgeous amber glass candle is a joy to light when I get home ;-) The warm sandalwood notes are evocative of the cooler nights coming soon...I have visions of leaves and pumpkins!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love coming home to this candle and lighting it when I unpack from work and start my nightly routine. I normally don't gravitate towards amber scents but this is so warm and soothing! Plus, added bonus the glass matches my home decor!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent and it completely changed my mind about warm tones/ambers (which I'm generally not a big fan of) and it fills the space nicely without being overpowering. Will definitely get another once I burn through this one!

reviews.review_title: Rich scent - but not over powering
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This beautifully packaged candle gives of rich notes of amber and sandalwood without being too heavy. Itu2019s a lovely, relaxing scent. This is definitely one of my new favs!

This candle smells amazing, it has a woody rich scent that is also soft and mildly sweet- a perfect balance in my opinion. I also love the amber glass container and the fact it comes with a lid so I can extinguish the flame without the smoke filling the air .
This candle smells so yummy and reminds me of fall. It is so warm and makes me want to cozy up and read a book.
One of my FAVORITE candles! Great size candle that burns a long time. I keep it lit almost all day. Homey and inviting smell that spreads throughout the house. Love the amber glass glow as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This candle really gives off a fresh and homey feel! The scent is very pleasant and the decorative jar is a plus. Soo pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite candle! Iu2019ve been buying it for years both for myself and as a gift. Itu2019s a warm scent that instantly gives any room an inviting feel. I also keep the jars to put plants in afterwards because theyu2019re prettier than any plant pot you can find!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous glow and smell! Creates such a warm and inviting ambiance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite Voluspa fragrance and has been for years! Its warm, inviting and gives you that perfect homy feel! This size is perfect because it last long and it fills up my whole living room! Love love love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Baltic amber has been my absolute favorite VOLUSPA scent for forever- truly since the first time I bought one of these candles probably 15 years ago. It's warm, comforting & sweet but not cloying or overpowering. When I burn this candle in my apartment it's like wrapping myself in a cozy blanket on a cool fall day after pulling a fresh tray of sugar cookies out of the oven. The strong vanilla fragrance is amazing and I love the subtle spicy and woody undertones. Plus the gorgeous jar... I mean it would personally be difficult for me to give one of these candles away but I don't know anyone who wouldn't be thrilled to receive one as a gift. The best!!!

reviews.review_title: The Perfect Way to Bring in Fall
reviews.review_text: I had a visceral reaction to smelling this candle. I'm a fall girl and this candle makes me *so* happy. It's probably my favorite fall scent to burn - it just makes my house feel so cozy and homey. You won't be disappointed.

Joining the Baltic Amber party! Similar to the other reviews, this is one of my favorite scents from VOLUSPA. I love it so much that I always have an extra one on hand.   Baltic Amber is one of those classic Voluspa scents. It's warm, but neutral in the sense that it anybody would love it. It's not overly floral, or overly earthy, or overly fruity. It's an ambient scent that can be used year round, but it's my go to fall scent in my apartment. Plus, the big jar burn time is SO long. Literally could burn it all day, days on end and it would take forever to burn out. I always have a back up on hand. I've also gifted this candle a few times during the holidays/housewarming gifts and my friends love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful glass jar with stunning home scented candle. The fragrance is the perfect balance of scents and not too over powering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Baltic Amber is one of those classic Voluspa scents. It's warm, but neutral in the sense that it anybody would love it. It's not overly floral, or overly earthy, or overly fruity. It's an ambient scent that can be used year round, but it's my go to fall scent in my apartment. Plus, the big jar burn time is SO long. Literally could burn it all day, days on end and it would take forever to burn out. I always have a back up on hand. I've also gifted this candle a few times during the holidays/housewarming gifts and my friends love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite scent! If I could have one candle forever it would be this. It has a warm cozy scent that I initially bought for fall but continue to use it year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Favourite scent ever! I love fragrance but some candles are too overwhelming. This is lovely. It does throw scent but subtly. The amber glass container is beautiful also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No clue why this has low ratings, itu2019s my favourite smelling candle on earth! It has a warning, really soft and lightly woodsy scent without being too sickly sweet. Iu2019m obsessed and this is the candle I always gift to people!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this smells amazing. i dont know why people are saying it doesnt throw scent. it does. its beautiful. highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: unfortunately the smaller version is way stronger than this one. I'm pretty disappointed but its a pretty candle even without the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This candle smells lovely, warm and sweet but not overwhelmingly so. The scent spreads and lingers nicely and I find myself smelling hints of it days after I burn it. I took off one star because the wick placement was off-centre a little bit, making it difficult for the wax to melt all the way to the edge on one side without burning it for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite candle ever. I love warm but not overly sweet smells and this fits the bill. Iu2019m not sure if it is an issue with the lots that went to Sephora, but Iu2019ve bought multiples of these and never had an issue with the scent not spreading nicely in a 1,000+sq ft space.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This candle is garbage I donu2019t smell anything. Like can u return a candle you burned for an hour cuz I smell nothing. I thought it would be nice cuz itu2019s voluspa but it SUCKS. Seriously bath and body works is WAY better I cannot SMELL ANYTHING. Donu2019t buy it. Waste of money SERIOUSLY

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the light vanilla scent of this candle. Some people expressed that they thought it smells like nothing. The scent is just not overwhelming. Very warm and adds a beautiful subtle scent to the room.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to treat myself to one of these candles, but learned the hard way high price does not mean better quality. I was so excited to receive it yesterday and immediately lit it up. I burned it for four hours and in that time I smelled nothing. The candle was burning in small room and I was sitting right beside it and didn't smell a thing. For the price of these candles, the fragrance should fill the room. I've had much better performance for BBW candles. I immediately contact CS and was told sorry, no refunds, even though the candle is poor quality and burned ONCE. That is $30 down the drain. I will NEVER buy from the company again!! At least Bath and Body Works stands behind their products and allows returns if you are not satisfied.  I will make sure everyone knows how overpriced and low quality these candles are. My first and LAST time buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to agree w other reviewers, the jar itself is beautiful and when I stick my nose in it to smell it itu2019s a beautiful smell, however once lit I smell absolutely nothing. My Marshallu2019s candles that cost me way less have a way nicer  and stronger scent. 2 stars for the beautiful jar only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like nothing. Writing this while my nose is less than a foot away from the candle, and I canu2019t smell anything. Even if I stick my nose in it. Iu2019m keeping it cause itu2019s a fancy candle and I like candles, but donu2019t buy this if you actually want a candle that smells like something!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla is too overpowering. Notes of sandalwood and amber are overwhelmed by it. If you are looking for a musky/incense scent, this isnu2019t the one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite scent! Light spicy aroma. It burns a long time and I clean and reuse the jars after for craft supplies. I also give these for gifts, and are always a hit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The candle is beautiful and smells great. The scent is soft, warm, and cozy. I don't have another candle that smells like this one. The throw is not quite as far as I would like or as compared to other candles I have. I. looking forward to using the vessel as a make-up brunch holder on my antique vanity once the candle is all used up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it is pretty but no throw it is pretty but no throw
Totally agree with one of the reviews. The bigger jar is valuable and looks really pretty, but too bad no real smells at all :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This looks really pretty, but there is no throw. I also got the 3 wick french Cade and lavender. Same thing - looks really pretty, but no real smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely scent with main notes of amber and a hint of vanilla. Not as strong as other Voluspa candles, but great for cooler days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad they finally made my favorite scent available - reminds me of sandalwood. Came a little melted but hey, we're in a heatwave and they're made out of coconut wax. If you're going to buy these jarred candles though, you really need to leap to buy the bigger size (I bought one bigger and one mini) a - it's so much visably more appealing and you get more for your money. Love it!
